// Code generated by ArduinoML
// Structural concepts
void setup() {
    pinMode(12, OUTPUT);
    pinMode(8, INPUT);
    pinMode(9, INPUT);
}

//Behavioral concepts
long time=0; long debounce = 200;

void state_off() {
    digitalWrite(12, LOW);
    boolean guard = millis() - time > debounce;
    if (digitalRead(8) == HIGH && guard ) {
        time = millis(); state_one();
}
    else { state_off(); }
}void state_one() {
    digitalWrite(12, LOW);
    boolean guard = millis() - time > debounce;
    if (digitalRead(8) == LOW && guard ) {
        time = millis(); state_off();
}
    if (digitalRead(9) == HIGH && guard ) {
        time = millis(); state_two();
}
    else { state_one(); }
}void state_two() {
    digitalWrite(12, HIGH);
    boolean guard = millis() - time > debounce;
    if (digitalRead(8) == LOW && guard ) {
        time = millis(); state_off();
}
    if (digitalRead(9) == LOW && guard ) {
        time = millis(); state_one();
}
    else { state_two(); }
}
void loop() {state_off();} // Entering init state
